thread.title: Silver Alert issued for 20-year-old Knightdale man
thread.title_full: Silver Alert issued for 20-year-old Knightdale man

title: Silver Alert issued for 20-year-old Knightdale man

organizations.name: north carolina center for missing persons

text:
Silver Alert issued for 20-year-old Knightdale man 
Posted 7:39 p.m. today Your friends e-mail addresses (comma separated): * Subject: * Find News Near Me 
Knightdale, N.C. â€” The North Carolina Center for Missing Persons has issued a Silver Alert for a missing endangered man, Marquis Brandon Lee., who is believed to be suffering from dementia or some other cognitive impairment. 
He is described as a 20-year-old male, standing 5 feet 6 inches tall and weighing 150 pounds. He has brown hair, brown eyes and was last seen wearing a blue shirt. 
Anyone with information about Richard Dwayne Floyd should call OFC Kerry Campagna at the Knightdale Police Department at 919-217-2261. Credits
